twitch_info.title: Highlight: 286+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: hello welcome back
good luck with this zone of fun and happiness
thanks lorema2ShimmyO I'm trying to keep a positive attitude for the grind
you're doing pretty good
with the first half
already
good or bad, I will do my best
that consistency to jump or die attack holy moly
this is what i was dreaming about while grinding ds
which attack is jump or die?
vertical bullets and arrows from the right side that force you to jump
ok that
i consider everything from this attack as the second half
I think that's about right
that's about 1 minute in
because from this point the avoidance goes for serious
well tbh the actual second half in people's opinions is somewhere around the shower attack
yeah, in terms of deaths, I don't know where the second half would be
dude your strat for the first pattern is still badass as hell
have never seen it from others
yeah, rainydayta does it too
it's the best
but it not necessarily the easiest
but also probably not too much more difficult
rainydayta is the one who hasn't cleared the game so far I suppose
because I don't remember him in ahof
not even sure what their pb is
I think they are not going to clear
because I don't think they play this game anymore
so they just play for fun
or don't even play the game huh
not like us, who play to WIN
yayyyy serious grind
recently i just signed up to fm2022 avoidance tournament
not even knowing any information about how it usually goes
neat, I hope it's fun
so I kinda don't know what to expect lol
I think you just play a bunch of avoidances where the person who gets hit less advances to the next round
and if the hits are a tie, then its whoever had the longest time between hits
and both players have the same seed
hm, i hope I'll not mess up in the beginning of the event BloodTrail
both players have the same seed??? pog
that's interesting
well, I will be rooting for you no matter what (but I'm not sure if I will catch the event live, hopefully I will)
or rather all participants have the same seed
the event will start in july
13th if i remember
well, each match has a different avoidance, so each of those matches will feature both players playing the same avoidance with the same seed, yeahg
pretty long time to wait honestly but if my application is accepted then i will be hyped as hell
because this will be my first participation in that kind of events
I hope you enjoy it
walk or die moment
I was sure I had that, but then walk or die said "no"
kinda similar to that unfairness in a curving part of this attack
because sometimes it goes totally impossible
honestly, it's usually doable if you read far enough ahead
counte3Monika
hi countershooter
hi
it may not look like it, but these are "serious" attempts
i want to clear this too :O
@countershooter then good luck!!
another destructionstate enjoyer lorema2ShimmyO Hope you clear faster than I will LUL
i did last z version, but here pattern`s are different :)
need to learn again :p
last z ver is also pretty hard isn't it
i did 10 times, so
not much :D
last z version may still be hard, but looks nerfed to shit to me
if i remember, some attacks are strongly nefred but it still has that ds vibe
they messed up the falling bursts attack
the bullets that go through the ceiling just despawn
but in the original version they don't
also, the curving bursts before walk or die curve in the wrong direction LUL
on the pattern after falling you also need to do 2-4frame jump :p
i remember only a big ass nerf in walk or die where bullets speed is lowered very much
pretty sure that's every attack LUL
so the attack lost its true difficulty compared to the original one
so yes, there every attack nerfed, and changed patterns
well i assume last z version is still a pretty good avoidance to beat in order to prepare for the original game
not sure if anyone did last z ds before actual ds aside from ipecac
maybe max????
max was playing last z?
maybe he played a different z game
he played the one with bye the bye
i know he beat z trilogy
straight to z3
last z is like z 4 then?
ye
i think so
can't say you beat z 3 trilogy without z 3 ex
but autor is mad when people call z4 :D
wonder who's going to bother with that
I'm not into z games so far unfortunately
I think casual has said they aren't that good anyways
they are bad
last z is ok
oh, yeah, just found a problem in tournament participation
different timezones
i checked pst before the application and the difference to my time is insane
you didn't think of that huh?
can't stay up all night playing avoidance?
yeah i guess I can't
but i just found a solution now
and I'll probably do it
move to a different timezone? Kappa
shit, i wasn't thinking about a solution and wrote an inconvenient availability
i can move pc to my room in tournament period
I think you can contact the organizers to change your application
if you need to change times or something
i found another problem
I'm sure they'd be happy to help
my brother sleeps in our room LUL
kinda don't want to bother him since he goes working in a morning
get him to sign up too, problem solved Keepo
so is there no other room you could use?
well, i put 10am - 12 pm as my free time
i suppose it is kinda inconvenient
i can use a kitchen Kappa
I mean, if people will let you use the kitchen, you could try
i was kidding, the kitchen isn't a solution because everyone still would hear my keyboard noises or whatever i will do
sounds like a hard situation
such an issue
so 10pm - 12pm is an inconvenient time for pst timezone
you think so?
Do you think that your family would be willing to put up with it for one day if you told them about it?
im pretty sure theyll not, as they go to work in early morning
honestly, I am surprised that anyone else would be able to hear your keyboard from another room
mechanical keyboards are kinda loud you know
yeah, but from another room? and they're sleeping too
especially my hyperx alloy fps with loud red switches
you could also test by having someone else type on your keyboard and then you stay in their room and see if you can hear it LUL
because otherwise, I don't see how you can play during the tournament
the timezone is what it is
if you know, what's the approximate time for tournament matches?
i suppose a midday or so
I'm not sure
if it goes until 12-1pm then its ok
but i am not sure it does
that early
in 2020 it was scheduled for 1:16 pm
not sure what the schedule is this year
it is midnight in my timezone BloodTrail
it will definitely be longer than an hour too
well, i know the time of the tournament is formed based on participants' availability they put in their applications
oh, well then it's time to change the application or something
what time would you rather have submitted?
i put 10pm - 12pm in my application which is pretty problematic honestly
but what time would you want instead?
just checked the spreadsheet, a person called murzikk, which is also a russian, put almost the same free time as mine
so i suppose the russians have pretty bad conditions it that kind of tournaments Kappa
timezone debuff LUL
I want to make the time as convenient for everyone as possible, but unfortunately, i think I can't do anything with it
by everyone i mean people who's timezone difference is not as much as mine
or even no difference
whose*
it's one of the downsides of having a global community
but i guess i still have a chance to participate without any issues
who knows what the schedule will be
we'll see
i have an optimistic mindset in everything
that's a good asset
nice
got showered
the shower attempt B)
it gave a bad rng since it started accelerate as i saw
yeah
one shower in 1:40 is pretty bad anyways
I need a shower ever 20 minute man
did you practice the game while being inactive on twitch?
yes I did
let me check how much
~15 hours
ill always remember your insane attempt in practice tool
that's like an actual clear but wuthout the easiest first attack
yeah
I put it on youtube too
i saw
so I'm going for my second "clear"
it surprisingly appeared in my yt recommendations
Destruction state with good rng is like ~80 difficulty
getting this good rng is 99 difficulty
yep
i was watching my ds clear and saw my first falling burst dodge
it was insane
the game really didn't want me to beat it on that attempt
yeah, that was wild
but when i got to disgusting arrows the game spared me
another shower attempt huh
this is what you want from your gaming
yeah, but I threw that shower attempt away immediately LUL
but I am happy I got there again
it is indeed exactly what I want
you start doin it B)
my strategy is just to get a ton of attempts to shower and then I will eventually get luck and clear
i know you've got a big consistency on falling bursts so this probably will not be a big problem
when you pass the shower
yeah, that's what I'm hoping
but falling bursts still routinely kill me if they give a bad pattern
especially the first burst
second one is not as scary
the second rng attack repeat is kinda chokeable as it gets a bit faster
it gets faster? are you sure?
when i was trying to rebeat the game i died on that buffed attack 2 times
isn't it?
i know this attack gets buffed there
compared to the beginning one
let me check
pretty sure they're the exact same
or bullet density increases
I might check the code later and report back
i am confident it is harder than the first one
that would make sense, since they are further away
you know what, I will just check right now
finished with attempts anyways
lets go
a little bit of gaming today at least
redire also says it is harder though
bloggerop either was dying to it or doing insanely precise dodges
he's probably referring to the fact that there are two bursts and they are in a different position
because I just checked and they're all the same
40 bullet rings moving at 16 speed max
wait you're checking falling bursts?
yes
or the attack called here we go again
oh, you were talking about here we go again?
you know i was talking about "here we go again" attack all the time
yeah LUL
i just don't know how to name it properly
sorry
ok, that one is harder
I am certain of that
I will check tomorrow and report back
but probably just denser or faster or something
anyways, thanks for watching
well that was a total waste of time because i couldn't name the attack properly
sorry for that
a bit of time wasted, but it's ok
I was curious about that attack anyways
or I would not have bothered to check it
it is faster i am 90% sure
yeah, and we will see just how much, on the next exciting episode of my stream
Keepo
thanks for this stream
lorema2SMOREc
bye
welcome back to twitch, ds king
bye
thank you
